receive-enable.description: Enable/disable MPLS OAM packets can be received.

oam-loss-sd.description: Configure the SD threshold of OAM loss measurement.

oam-loss-sf.description: Configure the SF threshold of OAM Loss Measurement.

slm-send-enable.description: Enable/disable a device sends packets for proactive single-ended loss measurement.

slm-threshold1.description: Configure threshold1 of proactive single-ended loss measurement. The default value is 1.

slm-threshold2.description: Configure threshold2 of proactive single-ended loss measurement. The default value is 10.

two-dm-send-enable.description: Enable/disable a device sends packets for proactive two-way delay measurement.

two-dm-exp.description: Configure the exp value of proactive two-way delay measurement. The default value is 7.

two-dm-packet-size.description: Configure the packet size of proactive two-way delay measurement.

two-dm-pad-value.description: Configure the padding value of proactive two-way delay measurement. The default value is 0.
